CustomField.description: Lookup to the User object. Stores the user associated to this Time record. This is field allows a Time entry to be created by a user on behalf of someone else. Defaults to the currently logged in user when creating a new record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Resource associated to this Time entry. Only change this value if you are entering time on behalf of another user, otherwise leave the default.
CustomField.label: Resource
